item.title: 巴基斯坦通胀降温，为进一步降息提供空间
item.description: 巴基斯坦的通货膨胀在 8 月份进一步放缓，为中央银行进一步降低利率提供了空间。【原文：Pakistan’s inflation eased further in August, giving the central bank room to reduce interest rates further.】

item.title: 钯金暴跌导致减记，西班尼上半年出现亏损
item.description: Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. 预计上半年将出现亏损，原因是钯金价格前景低迷引发其美国矿山再次减值。【原文：Sibanye Stillwater Ltd. expects to post a first-half loss, as the depressed outlook for palladium prices triggered another impairment on its US mines.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦在预算短缺的情况下考虑对银行征收更多税收
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦总统再次呼吁为该国的贷款人提供更加 "公正 "的税收负担，他说这些贷款人被认为是 "世界上资源最丰富的国家中最赚钱的"，因为政府正在努力缩减预算赤字。【原文：Kazakhstan’s president reiterated a call for a more “just” tax burden on the country’s lenders, which he said were considered among “the most profitable in the world’s resource-rich countries,” as the government struggles to shrink a budget deficit.】

item.title: 赞比亚遭遇历史性干旱，每天供电仅三小时
item.description: 赞比亚的电力危机愈演愈烈，由于几十年来最严重的干旱，占发电量约 85% 的水力发电受到抑制，现在家庭每天的供电时间不超过三小时。【原文：Zambia’s electricity crisis has intensified, with households now getting not more than three hours of supply daily after the worst drought in decades curbs hydropower generation that accounts for about 85% of output.】

item.title: 韦丹塔计划自 1 月重组以来首次出售美元债券
item.description: 韦丹塔资源有限公司（Vedanta Resources Ltd.）旗下的一个部门正计划出售自该集团今年早些时候重组其部分美元票据以来的首笔美元债券，这标志着这家负债累累的矿业公司的前景有所改善。【原文：A unit of Vedanta Resources Ltd.’s is planning to sell its first dollar bond since the group restructured some of its US currency notes earlier this year, signaling improved prospects for the debt-laden miner.】

item.title: AIB 与爱尔兰政府达成 5 亿欧元股票回购协议
item.description: 爱尔兰 AIB 集团公司（AIB Group Plc）发表声明称，该公司周一与爱尔兰财政部达成了一项 5 亿欧元（约合 5.53 亿美元）的股票回购协议。【原文：Ireland’s AIB Group Plc agreed a share buyback of €500 million ($553 million) with the country’s finance ministry Monday, according to a statement by the lender.】

item.title: 丹斯克银行从劳埃德银行挑选女性高管担任新任首席财务官
item.description: 丹斯克银行从劳埃德银行集团（Lloyds Banking Group Plc）聘请塞西尔-希拉里（Cecile Hillary）为新任首席财务官，这家丹麦最大的银行正在组建领导团队，以帮助其摆脱长期的洗钱丑闻。【原文：Danske Bank A/S hired Cecile Hillary from Lloyds Banking Group Plc as its new chief financial officer, as Denmark’s largest lender sets the leadership team that will help it move on from a long-running money-laundering scandal.】

item.title: 阿托斯下调业绩预测，但表示重组计划保持不变
item.description: 在一些客户终止或推迟与这家陷入困境的法国 IT 公司签订合同后，Atos SE 下调了今年的业绩展望，并修订了到 2027 年的业务计划。【原文：Atos SE cut its outlook for the year and revised its business plan through 2027 after some clients terminated or delayed awarding contracts with the embattled French IT company.】

item.title: 利率上调导致土耳其经济增长放缓
item.description: 截至 6 月份，土耳其的季度和年度经济增长均有所放缓，凸显了借贷成本上升的影响。【原文：Turkey’s economic growth slowed both in quarterly and annual terms through June, highlighting the impact of higher borrowing costs.】

item.title: 波诡云谲的九月让各地交易员惶惶不安
item.description: 对于交易员来说，9 月份历来是个糟糕的月份，而鉴于美联储降息预期的问题挥之不去，2024 年的 9 月份有可能更加难熬。【原文：September has traditionally been a terrible month for traders and risks being even harder to navigate in 2024 given lingering questions about the Federal Reserve’s anticipated interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 总理称泰国新内阁阵容已准备就绪，本周即可获得皇室批准
item.description: 泰国新任总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）表示，她已敲定内阁阵容，预计本周将把部长任命提交王室批准。【原文：Thailand’s new Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra said she has finalized the lineup of her cabinet and expects to submit the ministerial appointments for royal endorsement this week.】

item.title: 投资公司联席首席执行官本-加西姆将在三十年后离职
item.description: 中东最大的另类资产管理公司将在 30 年后失去一位最资深的高管，作为全面改组的一部分，董事长穆罕默德-阿拉迪（Mohammed Alardhi）将接任首席执行官一职。【原文：The largest alternative asset manager in the Middle East is set to lose one of its most senior executives after 30 years, as part of a sweeping reshuffle that will involve Chairman Mohammed Alardhi taking over as chief executive officer.】

item.title: 据称 Blackstone 接近达成 130 亿美元收购 AirTrunk 的交易
item.description: 熟悉此事的人士称，Blackstone Inc. 接近达成以 200 亿澳元（135 亿美元）（包括债务）收购澳大利亚数据中心运营商 AirTrunk 的交易，这可能是今年最大的数字基础设施交易之一。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is nearing a deal to acquire Australian data center operator AirTrunk for A$20 billion ($13.5 billion) including debt, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be one of the largest digital infrastructure deals this year.】

item.title: 瑞典房价因利率下降而有所回升
item.description: 瑞典国有贷款机构瑞典银行（SBAB）的数据显示，由于瑞典央行降息降低了购房融资成本，8月份瑞典房价有所上涨。【原文：Housing prices in Sweden rose in August as rate cuts by the country’s central bank have made it less expensive to finance home purchases, data from state-owned lender SBAB showed.】

item.title: 前台北市长在贪污调查中获释
item.description: 前台北市长、前总统候选人柯文哲在贪污调查中被捕后获释，这可能威胁到这位政治家及其新成立的台湾人民党的政治前途。【原文：Ko Wen-je, ex-mayor of Taipei and former presidential hopeful, was released from detention after being arrested in a graft investigation that could threaten the political future of the politician and his upstart Taiwan People’s Party.】

item.title: 中国房地产困境加剧，铁矿石跌回 100 美元以下
item.description: 由于对中国经济前景的悲观情绪再次拖累工业大宗商品，铁矿石跌回每吨 100 美元以下，扼杀了反弹势头。【原文：Iron ore slumped back below $100 a ton, snuffing out a rebound, as pessimism over China’s economic prospects again weighed on industrial commodities.】

item.title: 电池金属价格暴跌，天齐锂业扭亏为盈
item.description: 受电池材料价格大幅下滑的影响，中国一家大型锂生产商出现了自 2020 年以来的首次半年亏损。【原文：A major Chinese lithium producer swung to its first half-year loss since 2020, hit by the battery material’s massive price slump.】

item.title: ICICI Prudential AMC 出售印度主权债券以购买信贷
item.description: 印度加入全球债券指数吸引了投资者对该国主权债务的关注。一家市值 1,020 亿美元的基金公司的资产经理表示，现在是时候将部分资金转向公司债券了。【原文：India’s entry into a global bond index drew investors to the nation’s sovereign debt. It’s now time to rotate some of the money to corporate debt, according to an asset manager at a $102 billion fund house.】

item.title: 新世界和 Scion 首席执行官的香港房地产之痛加剧
item.description: 周一上午，新世界发展有限公司的股价下跌了 14%，香港房地产市场的低迷给这家亿万富翁郑氏家族拥有的公司带来了压力。【原文：New World Development Co.’s shares fell as much as 14% Monday morning, as Hong Kong’s property downturn weighs on the firm owned by the billionaire Cheng family.】

item.title: 分析师称日经指数可能增加两印经济学，削减日本制纸
item.description: 日本日经 225 平均指数的指数编制机构预计最早将于周一宣布其定期审查结果，分析师预测该蓝筹股指数将增加无印良品连锁店运营商 Ryohin Keikaku Co.，并删除日本造纸工业株式会社（Nippon Paper Industries Co.【原文：The index compiler of Japan’s Nikkei 225 Stock Average is expected to announce its periodic review as early as Monday, with analysts forecasting the blue-chip gauge will add Muji chain operator Ryohin Keikaku Co. and remove Nippon Paper Industries Co.】
